text: Margaret Osborne duPont (born Margaret Evelyn Osborne; March 4, 1918 â€“ October 24, 2012) was a world No. 1 American female tennis player. DuPont won a total of 37 singles, women's doubles, and mixed doubles Grand Slam titles. She won 25 of her Grand Slam titles at the U.S. Championships, which is an all-time record. He was born in Joseph, Oregon. DuPont died on October 24, 2012 in El Paso, Texas at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Oregon
title: Margaret Osborne duPont
